plentry.pd: (0): Remote audio is in the initial state. SDK reports this state when REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_LOCAL_MUTED, REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_MUTED, or REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_OFFLINE occurs.
(1): The first remote audio packet has been received.

(2): The remote audio stream is decoded and playing normally. SDK reports this state when REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_NETWORK_RECOVERY, REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_LOCAL_UNMUTED, or REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_UNMUTED occurs.
(3): Remote audio is frozen. SDK reports this state when REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_NETWORK_CONGESTION occurs.
(4): Failed to start remote audio. SDK reports this state when REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_INTERNAL occurs.
